n = int(input())
l = list(map(int, input().split()))

inv = 0
out = 0
mult = 1
for i in range(32):
    curr = dict()
    opp = 0
    same = 0

    for v in l:
        if v ^ 1 in curr:
            if v & 1:
                opp += curr[v ^ 1]
            else:
                same += curr[v ^ 1]
            
        if v not in curr:
            curr[v] = 0
        curr[v] += 1

    for i in range(n):
        l[i] >>= 1

    if same <= opp:
        inv += same
    else:
        inv += opp
        out += mult
    mult *= 2
print(inv, out)
    
    
import sys
readline = sys.stdin.readline
from collections import Counter

N = int(readline())
A = list(map(int, readline().split()))
B = 31

table = [0]*N

ans = 0
rev = 0
for b in range(B-1, -1, -1):
    one = Counter()
    zero = Counter()
    cnt = 0
    cntr = 0
    for i in range(N):
        a = (A[i]>>b)&1
        if a:
            one[table[i]] += 1
            cntr += zero[table[i]]
            table[i] += 1<<b
        else:
            zero[table[i]] += 1
            cnt += one[table[i]]
    
    if cntr < cnt:
        rev += cntr
        ans |= 1<<b
    else:
        rev += cnt

print(rev, ans)
